title: Offline write queue for mutations not found
why_it_matters: Without an explicit offline write queue, writes may fail silently or require manual retries, increasing support/debugging effort.
suggested_fix: Introduce a queue for offline mutations and replay when online; surface retry status in UI.
acceptance_tests: Simulate offline mutation and verify queued retry after reconnect
evidence: Autosave writes go directly to Firestore without a queue abstraction in this module
